alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 9:02AM EST until February 19 at 9:45AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 945 AM EST. * At 900 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Waddington to 89 miles southwest of Nelson Corner, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Visibility of less than one quarter mile in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Massena, Gouverneur, Ogdensburg, Canton, Norfolk, Lisbon, Louisville, De Kalb, Fowler, Morley, Massena International Airport - Richards Field, Waddington, Richville, Hammond, Madrid, Rensselaer Falls, Norwood, Edwardsville and Hermon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
